message.body: Hi! I'm at the airport, heading home from France on way to another meeting
Ahh! I've never been to France to be honest. What's it like there?
I was in Lyon this time for a business meeting. It's lovely and the food is fantastic. What's the most interesting place you've ever traveled?
Probably Ireland and/or Scotland. Pretty rough tie between those. Went there for choir and I'd love to go back some time.
Ooh, where did u go in Scotland? I was in Edinburgh a few yrs ago and loved it
Edinburgh as well and we did some hiking but spent most of it in a bus. :'(
I was there for a conference but had a couple days for sightseeing
I've never been to Ireland but its up there on my list
Oh no. Sort of like a charter bus. It was a school choir trip! And Ireland is gorgeous. All I could think when I got back was that our grass just wasn'tgreen enough. Haha.
Oh, like a school trip. I never got to do one of those. Sounds like it could be either awesome or hellish
But had to have a bad time in Ireland I guess
Hard to have a bad time, I meant
